title: How to Successfully Lead Your Groups and Teams
description:
This module objective is to focus on evidence-based
management to try and understand what drives the
behavior of groups and their members. Our job is to try
and understand when, if, and how phenomena change as
we place people in situations where they need to rely on
others to get the job done. The module will loosely follow
Tuckman’s (1965) forming, storming, norming, and
performing model of group development. However, much
of our attention will be focused on the forming stage, as
everything that follows depends on successfully building
the team. In this module we will discuss the topics
specifically in the group and team context.
